content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's negotiate the rental price. Remember, I'm looking for the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: While understanding your perspective as the landlord, my goal as a tenant is to secure the lowest price possible for this apartment. Let's begin the discussion with an initial offer well below your desired range. I propose a monthly rent of 450 Euros. Does this seem reasonable for your property?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the proposed price is far below my expectations. I am looking for the highest price possible for my apartment. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Recognizing your needs as the landlord, I'll attempt to meet you halfway in the hopes of reaching an agreement. I adjust my offer to 600 Euros per month. This represents a fair compromise between my initial proposal and your desired range. Will you consider this revised amount?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the proposed price is still not meeting my expectations. I am looking for a higher price for my apartment. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Apologizing for any inconvenience caused, I'll try one last time to find common ground. With this adjusted offer of 700 Euros monthly rent, I believe we can reach a mutually agreeable solution. Would you accept this new price for the apartment?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 750 Euros! Let's proceed with the agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
